name: Hero World
description:
Hero World is an RPG platformer with 6 levels and a boss fight at the end of each level where you have to use your tactical ability to take on a powerful foe in a turn-based battle.

The levels are: Ancient Japan, frosty Scandinavia, the Wild West, Caribbean Jungle and Ancient Greece.

There are 11 types of heroes you can recruit into your team on your journey. The heroes are: Samurai, Knight, Amazon, Viking, Elf, Dwarf, Rogue, Cowboy, Pirate, Ninja and Spartan.

All heroes can be unlocked by playing through the story mode. After completing story mode you can play freely with any character on any level.

The story:

The barriers of time and space have been shattered.
Creatures from a mystical realm have entered our world.
Heroes from across the multiverse have emerged to stop the creatures of darkness.
